article_node.title: Core Silver Samples 316 g/t Silver & 0.62% Copper at the Valley Zone as Drilling Continues
article_node.summary: Core Silver Corp. reports high‑grade copper‑silver mineralisation confirmed over 4 km at its Laverdiere Copper Project, with 2025 drilling targeting the Valley Zone and Silver Lime Polymetallic Project to expand district‑scale polymetallic systems. Preliminary 2024 surface assays show 0.63 % Cu, 17 g/t Ag and 355 ppm Mo, while a 20 cm quartz vein at Valley Zone yielded 0.83 % Cu, 47 g/t Ag and 0.44 g/t Au. The company’s 2025 program aims to demonstrate significant scale and grade, positioning the Blue Property as a long‑term value‑creating asset for investors.
